DZCDNFiles

从CDN拉取静态文件的库

Usage

To run the example project, clone the repo, and run pod install from the Example directory first.

Requirements

Installation

DZCDNFiles is available through CocoaPods. To install it, simply add the following line to your Podfile:

pod "DZCDNFiles"

Author

stonedong, yishuiliunian@gmail.com
